text: Michael Wallis (born October 7, 1945) is an American historian, writer, journalist, movie, and voice actor. He is known for his voice role as Sheriff in the animated movies Cars and Cars 2. He was born in St. Louis, Missouri on October 7, 1945.Voices of Oklahoma interview with Michael Wallis, March 3, 2011 (accessed January 9, 2012). He studied at the University of Missouri. Wallis is married to Suzanne Fitzgerald-Wallis. ==References== ==Other websites== * Michael Wallis Online (official website) * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American historians Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:Journalists from Missouri Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Michael Wallis
